short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: Changes all YouTube link redirects to direct links.
short.de: Ändert alle YouTube-Linkweiterleitungen in direkte Links.
short.es: Cambia todos los redireccionamientos de enlaces de YouTube a enlaces directos.
short.it: Modifica tutti i reindirizzamenti dei link di YouTube in link diretti.
short.ja: すべてのYouTubeリンクリダイレクトを直接リンクに変更します。
short.ko: 모든 YouTube 링크 리디렉션을 직접 링크로 변경합니다.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e:
This extension for Chrome/Chromium changes all redirected links on YouTube to direct links. It also adds the direct link's domain as a tooltip that appears when the link is hovered over.

Source for this extension can be found at: https://github.com/navin09/cr-youtube-noredir/

This add-on by Navin (https://github.com/navin09) is licensed under the terms of the GPLv3.

Attributions:
* No u turn icons created by Andrean Prabowo - Flaticon (https://www.flaticon.com/free-icon/no-u-turn_6742739)

It also adds the direct link's domain as a tooltip that appears when the link is hovered over. Source for this extension can be found at: https://github.com/navin09/cr-youtube-noredir/ This add-on by [Navin](https://github.com/navin09) is licenced under the terms of the GPLv3.
